original: Danils, Karl Halvar, kapten, Linköping, f. 19/2/08 i Åtvidaberg, Östergötl. 1., av agronom Olof D. o. Elin Lindskog. G. 38 m. Hervor Charlotte Egnell. Barn: Agneta Charlotte f. 39, Lars 41, Eva Charlotte 45. — Stud:-ex., hand:gymn., Alnarps mejeriinst. h. kurs. Stud. mejeritekn. i Engl. 32, värmetekn. i London 37, mejeritekn. i Danm., Norge, Finl., Estl., Lettl., Tyskl., Holl., Belg. o. Frankr. 38-39. Dir :assist. i A-B Claesson & Petersén i Sthlm 36-40, kapt. v. Livgren :reg. i Linköp. sed. 40. SM, Södermani. bef :utb:förb. SM.
translated: Danils, Karl Halvar, Captain, from Linköping. Born on February 19, 1908 in Åtvidaberg, Östergötland county, son of agronomist Olof D. and Elin Lindskog. Married in 1938 to Hervor Charlotte Egnell. They had three children: Agneta Charlotte (born in 1939), Lars (born in 1941), and Eva Charlotte (born in 1945). He completed his secondary school education, commercial education, and studied dairy technology at Alnarp, Sweden. He pursued further studies in dairy technology in the UK (1932), heat technology in London (1937), and dairy technology in Denmark, Norway, Finland, Estonia, Latvia, Germany, Holland, Belgium, and France (1938-1939). He worked as a director's assistant at Claesson & Petersén AB in Stockholm from 1936-1940, then became a Captain in the Livgren regiment in Linköping in 1940. He was also a member of the Swedish Military Sports Organization and held leadership positions in the Södermanland regional branch.
